/* Mapper - faBoardList */
SELECT FANO, FATITLE, FACONTENT, FATYPE, FAADDSITE FROM TUFABOARD
FADELETEYN = 'Y'
AND
faType LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%'
faTitle LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%'
faContent LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%'
faType LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%' OR faTitle LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%' OR faContent LIKE '%' || #{fasearchkeyword} || '%'
AND FADELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY FANO DESC

/* Mapper - faBoardSelect */ SELECT FANO, FAID, FATITLE, FACONTENT, FATYPE, FAADDSITE, FAUPDATEDATE, FADELETEYN, FARECORDUPDATEDATE FROM TUFABOARD WHERE FANO = #{fano} AND FADELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY FANO DESC
mapper.insert: /* Mapper - faBoardInsert */ INSERT INTO TUFABOARD( FANO, FAID, FATITLE, FACONTENT, FATYPE, FAADDSITE, FAINSERTDATE, FAUPDATEDATE, FADELETEYN, FARECORDINSERTDATE, FARECORDUPDATEDATE ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL2(MAX(FANO),'FA'||LPAD(REPLACE(MAX(FANO),'FA')+1,4,'0'),'FA0001') FROM TUFABOARD), #{faid}, #{fatitle}, #{facontent}, #{fatype}, #{faaddsite}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: /* Mapper - faBoardUpdate */ UPDATE TUFABOARD SET FAID = #{faid}, FATITLE = #{fatitle}, FACONTENT = #{facontent}, FATYPE = #{fatype}, FAADDSITE = #{faaddsite}, FAUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, FARECORDUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE FANO = #{fano} AND FADELETEYN = 'Y'
mapper.delete: /* Mapper - faBoardDelete */ UPDATE TUFABOARD SET FAUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, FADELETEYN = 'N', FARECORDUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE FANO = #{fano} AND FADELETEYN = 'Y'
